name: Omi
description:
This is a student game, Omi, made at USC Games for class CTIN 532 taught by Peter Brinson

Code Monkey & Narrative: Austen van der Byl

Art & Scope Bully: Sherry He

(overall design by both Sherry and Austen)

Audio Lead: Dante Gofar

Music Composer: Marcus Levitan

Music Composer: Carlos M. Bru

Music Composer: José Pescador

Trailer music is part of the soundtrack, also composed by Carlos M. Bru

Thanks to USC Games and Berklee School of Music
